TopicTitle: [WIP]"KONQUEST:Modular components for permanent bases" by ASET (14/05/2014)

Articles.Content: Love your work ASET!
I really hope this mod gets completed and works with Rover Dudes resource system

Hi,

currently I finish updating all of my already published mods and after that, i promise to continue working on "Konquest"
I will be happy to beta-test any and all of your mods. They are among my favorites.

i will be happy to beta-test any and all of your mods. They are among my favorites.

ditto!!!

Hi,

currently I finish updating all of my already published mods and after that, i promise to continue working on "Konquest"

That's more than I dared hope for! Thanks for coming back, but make sure not to burn yourself out. Take your time
Happy to be a test subject.
Great news everyone!!

Alexustas, knowing you're back on the development of these mods makes me very happy! I've flown the ALCOR on all-IVA missions to most of the planets and moons and driven the ESR from KSC to both poles. I can't wait to start building Konquest bases in 1.0. Your designs are just fantastic.
Awesome to hear this is being worked on. Your the man.... man!
Oh happy day!
I'm seriously considering to make at least one of these modules the central part for my new Kron 4 ship. Amazing work so far. Can't wait until it gets released.
Excuse me if I don't get my hopes up... but it would sure be about time we at least got some new progress reports. I suffer for the lack of these components.
....waiting in line for KONQUEST

Excuse me if I don't get my hopes up... but it would sure be about time we at least got some new progress reports. I suffer for the lack of these components.

what asset promises always provides, let im make it perfect! do something else in real life or do some other project that doesn't require these parts in ksp. if you look back in the previous page alexustas said hes updating the other asset stuff and then he will focus on finishing these babies.

, too.

You should have the crew land in a separate craft then have them walk over to it

I think he's been busy with ALCOR updates, the new IVAs for the stock pods, and the new RPM screens. All expected to be of exceptional quality. I'm ok if KONQUEST takes a back seat.

Have you seen his newest videos!! I say, if SQUAD wants the best IVAs available, they ought to offer Alex a position.

Something like an Basestation to reduce the the Ping. You could put 1 or 2 Kerbals in it and they operate it.
